description.value:
You pull colors and shapes from the depth of your mind, projecting impossible creations into the world as tapestries of astral thread or sculptures of force and light.

Granted Spells

  • 1st: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Color Spray]
  • 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Mirror Image]
  • 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Sea of Thought]
  • 4th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Resilient Sphere]
  • 5th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Etheric Shards]
  • 6th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Blade Barrier]
  • 7th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Project Image]
  • 8th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Scintillating Pattern]
  • 9th: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Prismatic Sphere]

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dancing Lights]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shield]
